trans-unit.source: In a sense, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is always an embedded product. You can embed it in an application in which users access the database from a single Java Virtual Machine (JVM), or you can embed it in a server framework (an application that allows users from different JVMs to connect to <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> simultaneously).

seg-source.mrk: In a sense, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is always an embedded product.

You can embed it in an application in which users access the database from a single Java Virtual Machine (JVM), or you can embed it in a server framework (an application that allows users from different JVMs to connect to <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> simultaneously).

target.mrk: In a sense, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is always an embedded product.

You can embed it in an application in which users access the database from a single Java Virtual Machine (JVM), or you can embed it in a server framework (an application that allows users from different JVMs to connect to <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> simultaneously).

trans-unit.source: When <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is embedded in an application, the local JDBC driver calls the local <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> database.

seg-source.mrk: When <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is embedded in an application, the local JDBC driver calls the local <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> database.

target.mrk: When <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is embedded in an application, the local JDBC driver calls the local <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> database.

trans-unit.source: When <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is embedded in a server framework, the server framework's connectivity software provides data to multiple client JDBC applications over a network or the Internet.

seg-source.mrk: When <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is embedded in a server framework, the server framework's connectivity software provides data to multiple client JDBC applications over a network or the Internet.

target.mrk: When <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is embedded in a server framework, the server framework's connectivity software provides data to multiple client JDBC applications over a network or the Internet.

trans-unit.source: For local or remote multi-user connectivity (multiple users who access <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> from different JVMs), use the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> Network Server. If you require features that are not included in the Network Server, you can embed the basic <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> product in another server framework.

seg-source.mrk: For local or remote multi-user connectivity (multiple users who access <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> from different JVMs), use the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> Network Server.
If you require features that are not included in the Network Server, you can embed the basic <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> product in another server framework.

target.mrk: For local or remote multi-user connectivity (multiple users who access <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> from different JVMs), use the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> Network Server.
If you require features that are not included in the Network Server, you can embed the basic <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> product in another server framework.
